title: I love the Lord, I love the Lord I love the Lord, I love the Lord I love the Lord, I love the Lord I love the Lord within my soul Sweet Melody, Sweet melody Sweet Melody, Sweet melody Sweet Melody, Sweet melody Sweet Melody within my heart
